tossupQ:
BIOLOGY  Short Answer  Indicate the name of the common and treatable condition that 
occurs when a person’s eyeball is longer than normal and the lens focuses distant objects in the 
front of the retina.
bonusQ:
BIOLOGY  Multiple Choice  Quorum [KWOHR-uhm] sensing in bacteria occurs when 
bacteria “sense” other bacteria. Which of the following triggers this phenomenon to occur? 
 
W) Number of bacteria 
X) Density of bacteria 
Y) Production and detection of autoinducers 
Z) Bacterial fission
bonusA: Y) PRODUCTION AND DETECTION OF AUTOINDUCERS

tossupQ:
EARTH AND SPACE  Multiple Choice  Liquid water can store more heat energy than an 
equal amount of any other naturally occurring substance because liquid water has which of the 
following characteristics? 
 
W) It expands when cooled 
X) It has its greatest density at 4° Celsius 
Y) It has higher specific heat 
Z) It can be changed into a solid or a gas
tossupA: Y) IT HAS HIGHER SPECIFIC HEAT

Z) Local air pressure

false?  
 
W) Costs of carbon sequestration programs increase due to integration  
X) Iron fertilization in the ocean encourages phytoplankton growth, which removes additional 
carbon from the atmosphere 
Y) The use of cover crops between planting seasons could remove carbon from the atmosphere 
Z) Peat bogs are excellent for carbon storage
bonusA:
W) COSTS OF CARBON SEQUESTRATION PROGRAMS INCREASE DUE TO 
INTEGRATION
